  • Method Details

    • binary

      public static String binary(int value, int bits)
      Returns:
      The lowest bits of the given value as a binary string

    • debug

      public static String debug(Object object)
      Converts the given object to a debug string. If the object supports the AsString interface, the Stringable.asString(Stringable.Format) method is called with Stringable.Format.DEBUG. If it does not, the toString() method is called.
      Parameters:
      object - The object
      Returns:
      A debug string for the object

    • display

      public static String display(Enum<?> enumValue)
      Returns:
      The given enum value as a displayable string

    • html

      public static String html(String text)
      Returns:
      The given text trivially converted to HTML

    • nonNullString

      public static String nonNullString(Object value)
      Returns:
      The value as a string or an empty string if it is null

    • string

      public static String string(Object object, String defaultValue)
      Returns:
      The given object as a string or the given value if it is null

    • string

      public static String string(Object object)
      Returns:
      The given object as a string or "null" if it is null
